fn.p: The authors declare no competing or financial interests.

R.Å.N. conceived the study. U.M.L.N. and R.Å.N. performed all fieldwork jointly and contributed equally. U.M.L.N. organized and systematized the data, performed all statistical analyses and made tables 2, 3 and 4 and figures 1, 3 and 5. R.Å.N. wrote the manuscript and made tables 1, 5, 6 and 7 and figures 2 and 4.
This work was supported by grants from The Swedish Natural Science Research Council [94P07103], The Adlerbert Research Foundation and The Royal Society of Arts and Science in Göteborg.
